title: Network Traffic Anomaly Detection
description: An analyst must monitor network traffic logs to detect anomalous behavior indicative of a stealthy cyberattack.

tasks.description: Establish a baseline of normal network traffic patterns for a specific high-value server.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully models the normal flow of data to and from the server.

tasks.description: Monitor live network traffic and compare it against the baseline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst actively monitors the live data stream.

tasks.description: Flag a small, encrypted data exfiltration to an unknown foreign IP address during off-hours as a critical anomaly.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies the low-and-slow data theft.
